recipesJson.name: Rolled ice cream tacos
recipesJson.author: nks
recipesJson.description: The whole idea came up after watching this video https://www.facebook.com/sightsnbites/videos/199965990838996/  during last summer.i made several batches,and i found out that there are so many options on how to make your own sweet rolled taco.Fruits-caramel-ice cream-chocolate you name it!Capella's supersweet @ 0.25% is fine for me,but you can adjust it according to your taste
